content:
Hi, Robin,

Please provide more details. My understanding is that IMAP works, so are you downloading messages so you can switch to another email provider? Please explain and we can go from there. Nice to see you again. :) david
creator: davidsk

content: If you provide information, such as error messages and a screenshot of your incoming server settings pane, someone here may have suggestions. thank you
creator: davidsk

content: That message is coming from your email provider via thunderbird. Maybe, if you post error message and screenshot of your attempted setup, someone here may have suggestions. Thank you
creator: davidsk

content: Thunderbird does not have a function to import mbox files, so please be specific on the steps you are taking. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: The allmail folder is where all messages are stored, duplicates of their existence in other folders. Have you tried deleting from the primary folder for the messages? That would be my approach, as using the Allmail folder is generally not recommended. It doubles your disk usage and increases cpu and resource usage for every send and receive.
creator: davidsk

content: You need to share any error messages that are causing the issue.
creator: davidsk

content: Estensioni? Hai provato a disattivare l'accelerazione hardware? Menu > Impostazioni > Generale Togli la spunta da Utilizza lâ€™accelerazione hardware quando disponibile
creator: @next

content: I am unsure of your problem.. Thunderbird shows folders with same name in accounts under unified folders and shows folders that are unique separately under the account name. Is this what you're reporting? If not, please give more details. thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: That addon is supported by the developer, not Mozilla. I suggest you contact the developer or their support page.
creator: davidsk
